task.title: Invoke the Model-to-Model Transformation via Ant

context.p: An Ant build script is used to invoke the model-to-model transformation

step.cmd: Right-click on build.xml and select Run As > Ant Build...
Click on the JRE tab and make sure "Run in the same JRE as the workspace" is selected

step.stepresult: The console will display log messages as the transformation executes
